name: full-stack-open_part11_blog-app
description: Full Stack Open - Part 11 - Blog App

scripts.install: cd ./blogs && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.lint: cd ./blogs && npm run lint && cd ../backend && npm run lint
scripts.lint:fix: cd ./blogs && npm run lint:fix && cd ../backend && npm run lint:fix
scripts.test: npm run test:blogs && npm run test:backend

author: Tuomas "Tuppu" Liikala
